title: What is technology? How is it used in your day-to-day life? - Quora
tags: Tips and Hacks for Everyday Life

response.answer_text: Technology is a broad concept. Now today we are all surrounded by technology. Almost all the equipment we are using right now is made of technology. Such as Smartphones, laptops, computers, watches, etc.  These types of devices are developed solely on the basis of technology. The smartphone is a part of our life. This is also the technology that we use in our routine. Computers, laptops, televisions, etc. are all of the things that we use in our daily lives. This is all our technology. It is not only harmful to humans but also good. But don't worry that we will only think about the bright side of technology.
